item.title: Street left unswept, 24th September
item.description:
Unfortunately our street is left unswept for many days, if not weeks, on end. Only these reports seem to result in someone cleaning it. Please send someone as soon as possible and, going forward, on a regular basis (once a week at least).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pemberton Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox, 24th September
item.description:

item.title: More dumped household items, 24th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Nunhead Green, Nunhead, London

item.title: Fly tipped furniture near bin store, 24th September
item.description:
As you enter Culloden Close from St James Road, next to the bin store is fly tipped furniture. Reports that it was unloaded from a white van by a non resident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Culloden Close, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 177 Chevening Road NW6, 24th September
item.description:
There is a black rubbish bag left by the base of a tree on the pavement outside 177 Chevening Road NW6. The bag contains waste and is spilling out. There is also a white paper takeaway container and tissue on the ground nearby. Please arrange removal and cleanup.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunmore Road, London

item.title: Rubbish not collected by flats, 24th September
item.description:
There are waste bins that have been overflowing for weeks. This bin has a red tag on it and is full up, now people are putting rubbish beside it. This rubbish then blows around the estate, or gets pulled about by foxes making the estate look awful. I am selling my house and my last buyers pulled out because of the area being horrible. Please get this sorted and take more care of this area, it is affecting house prices for people that want to move and not attracting nice people ingot he area that will care about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valence Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Allsop Place, Marylebone, London
